record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - January 16, 2008)

[Page: H45]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on H.R. 2768.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
